description.author: Masahiro Sakai (masahiro.sakai@gmail.com)
description.synopsis: Assorted decision procedures for SAT, SMT, Max-SAT, PB, MIP, etc
description.description: Toy-level solver implementation of various problems including SAT, SMT, Max-SAT, PBS/PBO (Pseudo Boolean Satisfaction/Optimization), MILP (Mixed Integer Linear Programming) and non-linear real arithmetic.
description.category: Algorithms, Optimisation, Optimization, Theorem Provers, Constraints, Logic, Formal Methods, SMT

package-flags.name: forcechar8
package-flags.description: set default encoding to char8 (not to use iconv)

package-flags.name: withzlib
package-flags.description: Use zlib package to support gzipped files

package-flags.name: extraboundschecking
package-flags.description: enable extra bounds checking for debugging
